thamata labena prathya aduwe yayi sithu ema aaramaye digatama wadasiti bhikshuwa,rahathan wahanse kerehi dweshayak athikara gaththeya.pasu dina danaya welawa pamini kalhi ema bhikshuwa danayata sangnya karana gediyata ha rahathan wahanse wadasiti kutiyehi dorata niyapitin thattukota danayata wadiyeya.thaniwama wadi supurudu bhikshun wahanse dutu dayakaya ‚Äúpera dina wadiya bhikshun wahanse danayata no wadiye mandayi‚Äù asu kala ema bhikshun wahanse kerehi dayakaya kalakirawana adahasin bhikshuwage pilithura wuye ‚Äúthama danayata sangnyakarana gediya gasa tika welawak bala sitiyada ema bhikshuwa nowadi nisa dorata gasa bala sitiyath nowadiye pera dina ema dayakayage niwasehi pranitha danaya walanda dirawa ganimata nohakiwa thawama nidibawin bawa pawasiya.dayakaya da thama niwasata wadi bhikshuwata manawa sangraha kota aaganthuka bhikshun wahansetada danaya kotasak gena gos dena lesa pathraya purawa kiri aaharayak mishra pranitha lesa dunneya.
